document.full_text: the virginia state police on monday identified the man they said shot four police officers, two of them fatally, in southwestern virginia last weekend, but the motive for the shooting remained unclear.
document.title: south: virginia: gunman kills 2 sheriff's deputies
lines_and_colors: the virginia state police on monday identified the man they said shot four police officers, two of them fatally, in southwestern virginia last weekend, but the motive for the shooting remained unclear.
